segments.text: Would you show me some table-cloths ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . ( Take a table-cloth to her )
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A table-cloth of this size and style is 15 Yuan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you take good care of it , it will last you quite a number of years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? I ’ ll take it then .
segments.speaker: S1
